ygData.subject: Ideas for a low level newbie?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all. I ve trolled this list a little and you guys all seem to give great advice. I was wondering if you could guide a first time EQ player on his future...
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all. I've trolled this list a little and you guys all seem to give
great advice. I was wondering if you could guide a first time EQ player
on his future...

I'm a level 7 human warrior in Qeynos:
Max 1H-Slash for my level
Max Kick for my level
Max Sense Direction for my level
30+ Offense
20+ Defense
10 or so Bash
1 in 1H-Bashing
1 in 2H-Slashing (No weapon yet)
0 in Hand-to-Hand
3 in Bind Wounds (I never use it)
30+ Fishing
10+ Tailoring (Great combo with the fishing. I make money for the
patterns)

My question is what skills/weapons should I actively pursue more than
others?? I've guessed so far just from things I've read on the net.
Should I ever put more than one practice in a weapon??

Thanks in advance for replies,

Faderic of Ellorisi Mar
